unauthorized.title: World’s Larges Online Casino and Sportsbook

affiliateCampaigns.title: Campaigns
affiliateCampaigns.description: See the performance of all your campaigns in one simple view below.
affiliateCampaigns.campaignHitsTooltip:
Campaign Hits: This refers to the number of hits (all clicks or visits from users) from a specific campaign.

 *All data featured across this overview is updated at least once every hour.
affiliateCampaigns.referredUsersTooltip:
Referred Users: This refers to all users referred through the specific campaign.

 *All data featured across this overview is updated at least once every hour.
affiliateCampaigns.firstTimeDepositsTooltip:
First Time Deposits (FTD): This shows new depositors who make their first deposit with BETIDA through your campaign.

 *All data featured across this overview is updated at least once every hour.
affiliateCampaigns.totalDepositsTooltip:
Total Deposits: This refers to all the deposits made across your currently active campaigns.

 *All data featured across this overview is updated at least once every hour.
affiliateCampaigns.overallCommissionTooltip:
Overall Commission: This refers to the total overall commission (estimated in USD) across your currently active campaigns.

 *All data featured across this overview is updated at least once every hour.

sort.ftdHigh: First Time Depositor Count: High to Low
sort.ftdLow: First Time Depositor Count: Low to High

affiliateCommission.title: Commission
affiliateCommission.description: View and track the earnings you've generated through your referrals. This section provides a clear breakdown of your commissions and payouts — keeping you in control of your earnings.

affiliateReferredUsers.title: Referred Users
affiliateReferredUsers.description: Track all the users who joined through your referral link. Here you can see their activity and gameplay - making it easy to monitor the growth of your network and the benefits you're gaining from referrals.
affiliateReferredUsers.firstTimeDepositsTooltip:
First Time Deposits (FTD): This shows new depositors who make their first deposit with BETIDA through your campaign.

 *All data featured across this page is updated at least once a day.

 *Only currently active users are displayed for each campaign. Users who have left the campaign will no longer be shown.
affiliateReferredUsers.monthlyFTDTooltip:
Monthly FTD: This shows a total of all new depositors who made their first deposits with BETIDA through your campaign in the past month.

 *All data featured across this page is updated at least once a day.

 *Only currently active users are displayed for each campaign. Users who have left the campaign will no longer be shown.
affiliateReferredUsers.totalDepositsTooltip:
Total Deposits: This refers to all the deposits made across your currently active campaigns.

 *All data featured across this page is updated at least once a day.

 *Only currently active users are displayed for each campaign. Users who have left the campaign will no longer be shown.
affiliateReferredUsers.vipUsersTooltip:
VIP Users: VIP users represent players with VIP levels higher than Platinum 1.

 *All data featured across this page is updated at least once a day.

 *Only currently active users are displayed for each campaign. Users who have left the campaign will no longer be shown.

pokerRefundPolicy.title: BETIDA Poker Tournament Cancellation and Refund Policy

settingsAPI.disclaimer: Disclaimer: betida.dev support will never ask you for this token. In giving this token to other people, you are granting them full access to your account.
settingsAPI.activeTokensDescription: BETIDA currently operates with a closed API and therefore the use of these tokens are very limited. Every time you choose to reveal a new API token using the "Token Creation" form, you are initiating a new independent session. Old tokens are not deactivated until you use the click to disable all tokens.

offersPage.welcomeOfferDescription: Enter your welcome offer code to claim your bonus. This is available to new users only.
offersPage.bonusDropDescription: Enter your bonus drop code to redeem additional rewards. Check your promotions for eligible codes.
